title: Silver 4 Looking for Duo/Flex Team.
body:
Okay so as title says im looking for a ranked team or duo partner. I am currently Silver 3 in Solo/q and Bronze something in Flex (i dont really care about my flex rank so i would just mess about in it with mates). Im primarly looking for a Duo Partner but im open for a flex team. I main Bot lane (support is my fav out of the 2 to play but i can play both) i can also play jungle. My aim is to climb out of silver so if ur keen just hit me up.

IGN: Sir Teapot

replies.body: HI I have just finished placements in Solo/q and have been place in Silver 4. Still have lots to lean as relatively new to the game. Am mainly trying to lean the ADC role but keep getting support in ranked. Keen to find a support main to team up with !! Cheers John
